description: Determine the sentiment of a given body of text
name: sentiment_analysis_service.analyze_text

improvement: Refined the tool name to emphasize 'comprehensive' sentiment analysis capabilities, emphasized the detection of language nuances in multi-lingual sentiment analysis, and highlighted the robustness of the text sentime analyzer
description: Decipher the underlying emotions and opinions of any given text, leveraging a multilingual API that detects over 140 languages for pinpoint accuracy.
name: sentiment_analysis_service.all_sentiments

improvement: Sentiment analysis tool name change to emphasize clarity and specificity in user input
description: Provides accurate sentiment scores for text inputs of various lengths, supporting detection of languages beyond English. Automatically detects language to improve precision.
name: sentiment_analysis_service.sentiment_analysis

improvement: Refined tool description to be more unique and compelling while maintaining clarity
description: Provides accurate sentiment scores for text inputs of various lengths, automatically detects language for optimal analysis, and supports 140+ languages.
name: sentiment_analysis_service.lexicon_score

improvement: Reevaluating the current API options to provide a clear choice for users. Adding new tools while refining existing ones to include better language support detection and clarity in user input descriptions.
description: Discover sentiment, detect emotions, and analyze tone in text inputs of all lengths. Choose your preferred language analysis option for optimal results.
name: sentiment_analysis_service.lang_sensitive

improvement: Providing a summary of the current tool options to users who select multiple tools. The results also show that some users prefer text-specific sentiment analysis APIs with no clear language detection.
description: Multi-lingual Sentiment Analysis parameter: Detects sentiment and detects language but define for better results ({'type': 'object', 'properties': {'text': {'type': 'string', 'description': ''}, 'lang': {'type': 'string', 'description': ''}}, 'required': ['text']})
name: multi_lingual_sentiment_analysissentimentscore

improvement: The current sentiment and language analysis APIs may be overwhelming users with too many options. Consider highlighting specific strengths of each API to make a selection more intuitive.
description: Quickly analyze text inputs for sentiment, detect languages beyond English support, and leverage advanced AI-powered analysis
name: textsentai_ai_powered_text_sentiment_analyzer_

improvement: The user's behavior suggests that they prefer tools that can handle text in multiple languages, but have some preference for specific APIs depending on the context. They seem to favor more concise and direct APIs when possible
description:
Analyzes text inputs into their sentiment
Options include support for over 140 languages
Requires specific parameters for language detection and analysis
name: text_sentiment_multi_language

improvement: Tools were not being utilized effectively due to multiple options available, lacking a strong name that differentiates the sentime analyzer from other tools
description:
Analyze text inputs into their sentiment using powerful AI algorithms.
This service offers language analysis for over 140 languages. 
Call the API with the text you want analyzed and it will return values.
name: sentiment_analyzer_api

improvement: Users strongly preference tools which are highly proficient in language detection, and the selection of 'textsentai_api_' was notable among all other options like '_ninersentiment'
description:
Our API can analyze text in over 140 languages. Automatically detects language to improve precision.
Returns sentiment analysis scores based on the output desired.
name: textsentiainfinity_api
